Package fi.tuni.tamk.LabyrinthOfLife

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HighScoreListener
    The HighScore part of the game needs to implement this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AfterGameScreen
    Screen of after the game, which shows the score.
    AfterTutorialScreen
    Screen for after completing the tutorial.
    AndroidLauncher  
    FileReader
    The class is used to read files.
    GameConfiguration
    Static class which contains Game settings and several tools.
    GameScreen
    The class is responsible for running the game level and tutorial.
    HighScoreEntry
    HighScoreEntry needs to have variables for all the attributes from the HighScore server.In the demo case, we need variables String name and int score.
    HighScoreServer
    To get this work on an android device add following line to AndroidManifest.xml: above tag
    HighScoresScreen
    Screen contains top 10 high scores, which are fetched from the server.
    LevelScreen
    Screen contains difficulty choosing options.
    Main
    The main class.
    MapGenerator
    The class produces a random labyrinth or the tutorial labyrinth.
    MenuScreen
    The class contains and controls the Main menu screen.
    PauseScreen
    Screen for pausing the game.
    PlayerNameScreen
    Screen for changing and setting the username.
    SettingsScreen
    Screen where the player can change the volume of the music and switch the control's locations.
    Sounds
    Class which contains all of the sounds and music.
    Textures
    Class for textures.
    ThemesScreen
    Screen for changing the map textures and character textures.
